parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of IVertex es or ISketchPoint s

parameters.name: PointTypes
parameters.description: Array of Points types as defined by swSelectType_e

title: ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData.GetPointMemberPairs
description: Gets the point-member pair(s) used to create one or more secondary structure system up-to members.
signature:
void GetPointMemberPairs( 
   out System.Object
Points
,
   out System.Object
Members
,
   out System.Object
PointTypes
)

parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of IVertex es or ISketchPoint s

parameters.name: PointTypes
parameters.description: Array of Points types as defined by swSelectType_e

remarks:
Points and Members arrays are ordered to create point-member pairs.
This method is valid only if
ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData::MemberPointParametersType
is set to
swSecondaryMemberUpToMembersMemberPointParameters_e
.swSecondaryMemberUpToMembersMemberPointParameters_PointMemberPair.
